hero_image.alt: Hero image for How to Get Clean Asset Data in CMMS: A Guide to Auditing, Structuring, and Governing Your Registry

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, high-quality image inside a modern, clean manufacturing facility. In the foreground, a reliability engineer wearing a white hard hat, safety glasses, and a high-visibility vest is holding a ruggedized tablet. The engineer is looking at a large industrial pump and appears to be verifying data on the tablet screen against the machine's nameplate. In the background, blurred slightly, another technician in blue coveralls is inspecting a conveyor system. The lighting is bright and industrial. No text or words should be visible on the tablet screen or machinery. The atmosphere conveys precision, technology, and organization.
